name: BlockPop
description:
Shoot at blocks that get faster and faster! Don't let them get past your defenses!

Simple to pickup, hard to master!
Track your personal bests!
2 game play modes.
Free play block popping mode - perfect for young children or just to relax
Customizable colors
Supports vibration
Adjustable start levels
Amazing popping sounds!
It's free!.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
How to play:

1) Shoot a line by tapping that giant button on the bottom to pop a block.
2) Hold on to the button and let go to shoot a super shot. Super shots need to be powered up by popping blocks.
3) Don't let blue blocks reach the bottom.
4) Don't shoot red blocks.
